Control Statement: The organization inspects the maintenance tools carried into a facility by maintenance personnel for improper or unauthorized modifications.Supplemental Guidance:  If, upon inspection of maintenance tools, organizations determine that the tools have been modified in an improper/unauthorized manner or contain malicious code, the incident is handled consistent with organizational policies and procedures for incident handling. Related control: SI-7.
